attributes.action: Award William (Billy) Bingham a knighthood for services to football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Northern Ireland player and manager, Billy Bingham has lead the Northern Ireland football team to 3 world cups and under his leadership Northern Ireland remain the British Champions having won the last competition ever to be played.  His team consisted of players from both sides of the community in Northern Ireland and as such brought both communties together to support one team.  As a player he was considered a legend at Everton Football Club and as manager of the club, he signed many players that became legends in their own right.  For his services to football and to public life in Northern Ireland, the undersigned wish the Government to acknowledge Mr Bingham by bestowing upon Mr Bingham a knighthood.
